No superpowerful chars. You've been playing Recon out to be way too
powerful, which is partly why Icedemon has been yelling at ya, so tone
him down a bit.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Johnny Brennan" <thejerkyboysare@h...> wrote:
> [Ah, but there's a loop whole to Recon's super power. He doesn't
know how to 
> use it, he never had to so he doesn't know how to activate his
power. Can't 
> use it if you don't know how can ya?]
